author: cbs8
title: From Universal Pictures Home Entertainment: Mrs. Brown's Boys: Complete Series
text:
Universal Pictures Home Entertainment
BRING HOME EVERY EPISODE OF THE BBC'S AWARD-WINNING COMEDY SENSATION
AVAILABLE ON DVD NOVEMBER 3, 2015 FROM UNIVERSAL PICTURES HOME ENTERTAINMENT
UNIVERSAL CITY, Calif. , Oct. 23, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Brilliantly funny comedian Brendan O'Carroll created and stars as loud-mouthed Irish matriarch, Agnes Brown in Mrs. Brown's Boys: Complete Series , the smash-hit BBC comedy series coming to DVD on November 3, 2015 , from Universal Pictures Home Entertainment. Crude, rude and charmingly hilarious, Mrs. Brown's Boys has broken records for viewership across the UK and Australia and is one of the highest-rated shows in Canada . This award-winning fan favorite show is beloved by millions across the world and has spawned a successful live tour, theatrical film and an animated series. For the first time, North American fans can own all 18 episodes of the series' three side-splitting seasons plus seven top-rated holiday specials in one collectible set. Featuring hours of bonus materials including the original pilot, cast interviews, and extended and alternate scenes, Mrs. Brown's Boys: Complete Series is perfect for holiday gift giving.
Created by Brendan O'Carroll and based on his wildly popular books, which include The Mammy and The Granny , Mrs. Brown's Boys chronicles the hilarious antics of Dublin's proudest, funniest and most foul-mouthed mother as she indulges in her favorite pastime: meddling in the lives of her long suffering six children. Always speaking her mind with uproarious results, Agnes has a heart of gold and a knack for making a mess of things. Winner of the 2012 BAFTA TV Award for Best Situation Comedy, Mrs. Brown's Boys follows the chaotic everyday lives of one woman's family with enormous humor and affection.
DVD BONUS FEATURES
Dermot's Dilemma (Un-aired Pilot) Deleted and Extended Scenes Introduction Interviews Outtakes Dedications Brendan's Jokes Between Takes Brendan's Surprise End of Season Wraps Alternate Scene Ending For artwork, please log onto our website at www.ushepublicity.com
FILMMAKERS:
Cast: Brendan O'Carroll , Jennifer Gibney , Dermot O'Neill , Paddy Houlihan , Eilish O'Carroll , Amanda Woods , Rory Cowan , Fiona O'Carroll , Danny O'Carroll , Pat Shields , Gary Hollywood , Martin Delany , Conor Moloney .
Directed By: Ben Kellett
Written By: Brendan O'Carroll , Paul Mayhew Archer
Based on the Books By: Brendan O'Carroll
Produced By: James Farrell , Stephen McCrum , Justin Healy , Mark Felland , Ewan Angus , Martin Delany
Production Designer: Iain McDonald
Edited By: Mark Lawrence
Costume Designers: Hannah Goldinger , Katherine Hyland , Yvonne Simpson , Helen Spain , Lee Wilmot
Music By: Andy O'Callaghan
TECHNICAL INFORMATION DVD
Street Date: November 3, 2015
Copyright: 2015 Universal Pictures Home Entertainment
Selection Number: 61174554 (US) / 61174593 (CDN)
Layers: Dual
Aspect Ratio: Widescreen, 1.78:1
Rating: NR
Languages/Subtitles: English SDH
Sound: English Dolby Digital 5.1/Dolby Digital 2.0
Run Time: TBD
About Universal Pictures Home Entertainment
Universal Pictures Home Entertainment (UPHE) is a unit of Universal Pictures, a division of Universal Studios ( www.universalstudios.com ). Universal Studios is a part of NBCUniversal, one of the world's leading media and entertainment companies in the development, production, and marketing of entertainment, news, and information to a global audience. NBCUniversal owns and operates a valuable portfolio of news and entertainment television networks, a premier motion picture company, significant television production operations, a leading television stations group, world-renowned theme parks, and a suite of leading Internet-based businesses. NBCUniversal is a subsidiary of Comcast Corporation.
